argument.name: InstanceName
argument.description: The name of the SQLLocalDB instance to delete.

page.discussion: *[xb:SQL::LocalDB::DeleteInstance]* deletes an instance. If the instance is running, it must be stopped before you can delete it.
page.example:
dim instances as c
r = sql::localdb::CreateInstance("foo") ?r.text = "Success"
r = sql::localdb::ListInstances(instances) ?r.text = "Success"
?instances = foo MSSQLLocalDB v11.0
r = sql::localdb::DeleteInstance("foo") ?r.text = "Success"
r = sql::localdb::ListInstances(instances) ?r.text = "Success"
?instances = MSSQLLocalDB v11.0
